sections.heading: Standard time [Effective upon meeting the contingency in 82 Del
sections.text:
Laws, c. 193, § 5].The standard time for this State is the time determined by 15 U.S.C. §§  260 through 267, however, this State is exempt from 15 U.S.C. § 260a (regarding the advancement of time) and instead observes the standard time
§

2;82 Del. Laws, c. 193,

2;
